task.title: Sign in to the Adobe Marketing Cloud
task.shortdesc: After your company has been provisioned and your solution credentials have been linked to your Adobe ID, you can sign in to the Adobe Marketing Cloud at <yourcompany>.marketing.adobe.com.

step.cmd: Verify with your administrator that your company is provisioned in the Marketing Cloud.

info.p: This step is for administrators. See .

stepresult.p: Account linking enables single-sign on between solutions (like Analytics and Social) and the Marketing Cloud.
